rules.title: Be nice
rules.description: It's not hard - just have decency.

rules.title: No griefing
rules.description: Don't destroy other people's stuff, and don't touch or change anything at people's islands without permission. This rule may be modified further down the line.

rules.title: No hacking or explotation
rules.description: Don't use any mods or hacks that give you an unfair advantage. Additionally, do not use any exploits you find in mods or the game.

rules.title: All team members <italic>must</italic> use the same origin
rules.description: This is to make the game more interesting. We will be checking. Do not try to circumvent this rule.

rules.title: Teams are limited to a maximum of around 2 members
rules.description: This is to make the game more interesting, as in previous SMPs we have had 2 big teams, which is less interesting.

rules.title: Admins have the final say
rules.description: If you have a problem with a rule, or a situation, please contact one of us.
